languages.text: "Как-то ты неуверенно и скупо отвечаешь на вопросы, Руолдо. Словно ты не губернатор, а случайный прохожий".
"Your answers are rather reticent and tentative, Ruoldo — almost as if you were merely a chance passer-by and not the governor."
languages.original_text: "Как-то ты неуверенно и скупо отвечаешь на вопросы, Руолдо. Словно ты не губернатор, а случайный прохожий".

traits.locale_text: "Your answers are rather reticent and tentative, Ruoldo. Almost as if you were a chance passer-by and not the governor."
"This is enough, Ruoldo. You have made too many mistakes for one conversation, a you sure you are the Governor?"
"Your answers are rather reticent and tentative, Ruoldo — almost as if you were merely a chance passer-by and not the governor."
"Your answers are rather reticent and tentative, Ruoldo — almost as if you were merely a chance passer-by and not the governor."
"Your answers are rather reticent and tentative, Ruoldo — almost as if you were merely a chance passer-by and not the governor."
"Your answers are rather reticent and tentative, Ruoldo — almost as if you were merely a chance passer-by and not the governor."
"Your answers are rather reticent and tentative, Ruoldo. Almost as if you were a chance passer-by and not the governor."

languages.text: “你的答复相当含蓄，也相当犹豫，罗尔多。你听起来根本不像是总督，更像是个偶然混进来的路人。”
languages.original_text: "Your answers are rather reticent and tentative, Ruoldo — almost as if you were merely a chance passer-by and not the governor."

traits.locale_text: “你的答复相当含蓄，也相当犹豫，罗尔多。你听起来根本不像是总督，更像是个偶然混进来的路人。”

languages.text: «Encuentro sus respuestas muy reticentes y ambiguas, Ruoldo; casi como si fuese usted un mero transeúnte y no el mismísimo gobernador».
languages.original_text: "Your answers are rather reticent and tentative, Ruoldo — almost as if you were merely a chance passer-by and not the governor."

traits.locale_text: «Encuentro sus respuestas muy reticentes y ambiguas, Ruoldo; casi como si fuese usted un mero transeúnte y no el mismísimo gobernador».

languages.text: "Cevapların oldukça zoraki ve belirsiz Ruoldo. Sanki vali değilsin de sokaktan geçen sıradan biri gibi konuşuyorsun."
languages.original_text: "Your answers are rather reticent and tentative, Ruoldo — almost as if you were merely a chance passer-by and not the governor."

traits.locale_text: "Cevapların oldukça zoraki ve belirsiz Ruoldo. Sanki vali değilsin de sokaktan geçen sıradan biri gibi konuşuyorsun."

languages.text: 「ルオルド、君の答えはかなり控えめで慎重だな。まるで総督ではなく、ただの通りすがりの人間のようだ」
languages.original_text: "Your answers are rather reticent and tentative, Ruoldo — almost as if you were merely a chance passer-by and not the governor."

traits.locale_text: 「ルオルド、君の答えはかなり控えめで慎重だな。まるで総督ではなく、ただの通りすがりの人間のようだ」

languages.text: « Vos réponses sont plutôt réticentes et hésitantes, Ruoldo. À croire que vous seriez plus un simple passant qu'un gouverneur. »
languages.original_text: "Your answers are rather reticent and tentative, Ruoldo — almost as if you were merely a chance passer-by and not the governor."

traits.locale_text: « Vos réponses sont plutôt réticentes et hésitantes, Ruoldo. À croire que vous seriez plus un simple passant qu'un gouverneur. »

languages.text: "Eure Antworten sind recht zurückhaltend und zögerlich, Ruoldo – als wärt Ihr nur ein zufälliger Passant und nicht der Gouverneur."
languages.original_text: "Your answers are rather reticent and tentative, Ruoldo — almost as if you were merely a chance passer-by and not the governor."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Antworten sind recht zurückhaltend und zögerlich, Ruoldo – als wärt Ihr nur ein zufälliger Passant und nicht der Gouverneur."
